title: 4 tech moguls who attended or donated to Trumps inauguration got $288 billion richer, cumulatively, in his first year back
full_text: 4 tech moguls who attended or donated to Trumps inauguration got $288 billion richer, cumulatively, in his first year back. Elon Musk, Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg, and Jensen Huang attended or donated to President DonaldTrump's inauguration. All of them got richer last year.. Elon Musk, Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg, and Jensen Huang have lost a collective $192 billion in wealth since Inauguration Day.Win McNamee/Getty Images; Gilbert Flores/Variety via Getty Images; Chris … [+4203 chars]
